title: Rise of the Ghost Lord has a new trailer, and @MetaQuest sponsored us to have Greg react to it live!
description:
Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord dropped a new trailer, and #MetaQuest sponsored us to have Greg react to it live! Wishlist the game now: https://metaque.st/MQGS_GB_kindafunnygamesYT Ghostbusters is for ages 13+. #QuestPartner #MetaQuestGamingShowcase #Ghostbusters

transcript_chunks.text: when metaquest hits you up and says hey we want to sponsor you to react to a very specific trailer you say yes this is what we've been waiting for Ghostbusters rise of the ghost Lord 1984. my research brought me to Columbia University where I studied under the Ghostbusters they dismissed my work called it dangerous yeah yeah let's go this is all I want to do what have I brought up on the world the time of the ghost Lord the time the ghost Lord is here ladies and gentlemen let us play it fall Fall's not soon enough of course I've played Ghostbusters rise of the ghost Lord I'm ready I'm excited this is my most anticipated VR game of the year
